result.title: Commenting on Individual Contest #1
result.content:
AlSalam Allaikum All,

Referring to the first individual contest, we have to say that the performance of all participants was so below the expected, the problems did not involve any complex ideas, yet, nobody showed a sign of concentration.

You are all required to re-read the problems that you couldn't manage to solve, try to solve them and refer to the solutions in the tutorial post.

We have also noticed some of the students didn't participate in the contest at all, we have to remind you that these contests would help estimate each contestant's level, and this might be referential for us. Also, those who fail to participate in at least 2 individual contests out of the three, would be automatically disqualified even if his (potential) team members meet the condition.

You are required to focus, and try to make a better performance next round.
